name: jdhenry105
text: My vote:  RoughBoy99.

name: deimosrising
text: Pants_come_off. Teodor is experiementing. He's more of a softboy than a roughboy anyhow.

name: relaxing
text: pants_come_off, because that is something you would need to know about a stuffed animal.

name: snowman
text: SO.  AWESOME.  AND TRUE.

name: idsyen
text: This is just about the only strip where, having had that pointed out, I can be absolutely sure that the author had that in mind.

name: laserblade
text: Lamed you, meant to chubby you.  *seppuku*

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by relaxing, Zoltan, Zem)

name: notcool
text: Considering future experiences, yeah. he's definitely a pants_come_off kinda stuffed bear.

name: huuugs
text: I disagree

name: em2
text:
Because he cusses at a real estate agent he is now a "RoughBoy"? I don't get it.
Nice Flaming Lips avatar/icon, though.

name: catachresis
text: And to think I never noticed the periscope until today

name: jokercross
text: Hell, the periscope is always what made me laugh the hardest.

name: rowboat
text: The periscope alone is the difference between a 2 Beef and a 3 Beef.

name: dovey
text: Me too!

name: dskim
text: Wow, I actually just thought that Phillipe was holding the phone at the end, passing a call to Téodor, who is getting called by a confused chat partner.

name: ambala
text: I think he's RoughBoy99 b/c he doesn't look embarrassed enough to be panst_come_off.

name: billyamericana
text: This is what you get for playing submarine in a man's office, son.

name: eric
text: Something tells me that Hiram (of the Oregon Trail plot) is pants_come_off

name: a_dude
text: hahaha cool periscope

name: rosie
text: Hehehe, another assault on T's sexuality. Hilarious.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Yes, thankfully, pants do come off.

name: crumpetsandtea
text:
i vote: pants come off.

when i first saw this strip i thought phillipe was handing T a phone in panel 3...

name: snowbeat
text: Both hands above the desk, Teodor!

name: snowman
text:
Read this several times before noticing the periscope.

Also, good thing Teodor had not gotten down to business yet.

name: hellofditties
text: Oh my goodness! Is this... the Olympics?

name: jjg
text: Philippe thinks that he is a submarine

name: hamscout
text:
Set this in my college computer lab, replace Theodor with me, and change Phillipe into the bookish girl I knew from my hometown.
...yeah, she looked.

...and she asked me out later...

name: relaxing
text: So were you pants_come_off or RoughBoy99?

name: hamscout
text:
Sadly, neither. In those naive, virginal days my screen name was probably something pathetic like "wholesome_silent_type".
If I was online now, I would be either flamed or gay spammed to tears.
In fact, there's a 93% chance that I was actually having 'NetSex' with a bi-curious dude from my own dorm...

name: wonelove
text:
Has anyone noticed that the computer screen does not stay inside the bottom border?

it sort of...rebeliously hangs off the edge.

name: sparhawk
text:
For one horrifying moment, I thought Teodor was being spied on by his own tumescent member...

Freud shits his pants and dies.

name: wonglers
text:
I voted this a 3.
And then I realized how funny pants_come_off was.

name: funcrusherplus
text: Where did Phillipe obtain a periscope?

name: zapatos
text: He is five.

name: kikineko
text: This is why you do not leave the periscope near the computer.

name: zapatos
text:
Re-reading the archives, I had it 5'd.

I coughed and laughed seeing this. Still 5'd.

name: deus
text:
Agreed, five.

Im gonna chubby you so it will inspire people not let this go stale.
